posts.body: If you're really worried about security you should get a plug that doesn't need to connect to the outside internet, though you'll only have local control over it that way. I don't know how important it is to be able to control while away from home, but if that is a feature you need you'll have to trust some vendor to keep your credentials safe.
Then delete it, what do we care what you do?

I don't understand the concern about global warming, evolution hasn't failed us in the 5.8 Billion years it's been doing it's thing. Also we've only recorded temperatures for what a few thousand years, who's to say that warming and cooling periods are normal.

Even if there were watermarks what would it matter, it would identify you as the leaker, assuming that you are. The only time I'd strip metadata is if I took the photo and wanted to make sure it wouldn't give away my location or name.

>>4b43ad7c-5e4c-4523-bf81-d679772d58f8
Wow, if I was posting I'd make sure to do so at a lower quality just to spite you. For somebody that is leaching off the goodwill of other people you sure don't sound very grateful.
